Question: While Azamat advises a return to New York, this person attempts to buy a handgun to defend himself against Jews.
Hints: This person's neighbors in Kazakhstan were portrayed by Roma people, who were unaware of the film's subject.
This person was previewed at the 2006 Comic-Con International in San Diego, California, on July 21, 2006.
This person was also nominated for Best Adapted Screenplay at the 79th Academy Awards.
